graphenbib

Class GPSCoordinate

  • java.lang.Object
    • graphenbib.GPSCoordinate

  • public class GPSCoordinate
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    arno The class can represent a GPS coordinate and compute a distance to another GPS coordinate.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GPSCoordinate

        public GPSCoordinate(double latitude,
             double longitude)
              throws InvalidGPSCoordinateException
        Constructor for a GPS Coordinate.
        Parameters:
        latitude - The Coordinate's Latitude
        longitude - The Coordinate's Longitude
        Throws:
        InvalidGPSCoordinateException - if the arguments are outside the GPS-Domain (-180 - 180)

      • distanceTo

        public int distanceTo(GPSCoordinate b)
               throws InvalidGPSCoordinateException
        Computed the Distance to another GPS Coordinate. (in cm)
        Parameters:
        b - GPSCoordinate to which the distance should be computed
        Returns:
        The distance between this Coordinate and b in cm
        Throws:
        InvalidGPSCoordinateException - if the GPS-Coordinate-parameter was null
